title: Nigerian Economic Indicators (2015-2023)
description: Key economic data for Nigeria including GDP, inflation rates, and employment figures sourced from National Bureau of Statistics (NBS).
tutorial: Use this data to analyze Nigeria's economic trends. Calculate average GDP growth and visualize inflation trends using matplotlib.
nigerian_context: This data reflects Nigeria's economic challenges and growth in the oil-dependent economy, relevant for understanding national development.

title: Physics Experiments: Projectile Motion
description: Experimental data from projectile motion experiments conducted in Nigerian secondary schools, including distance, angle, and velocity measurements.
tutorial: Compare experimental results with theoretical calculations. Plot range vs angle graphs to verify projectile motion equations.
nigerian_context: Data collected from physics labs in Lagos schools, using local sports equipment like footballs for relatable experiments.

title: Chemical Reactions: Acid-Base Titrations
description: Titration data from experiments measuring concentrations of acids and bases, relevant to Nigerian industrial chemistry.
tutorial: Calculate the concentration of unknown solutions and plot titration curves. Discuss applications in Nigerian soap and detergent industries.
nigerian_context: Titration experiments relevant to quality control in Nigerian manufacturing sectors like pharmaceuticals and food processing.

title: Nigerian States: Population and Climate
description: Geographic data including population, area, and climate information for Nigerian states, sourced from official statistics.
data_source: National Bureau of Statistics (NBS), Nigerian Meteorological Agency
tutorial: Create population density maps and analyze climate patterns. Compare resource distribution across states.
nigerian_context: Essential data for understanding Nigeria's regional diversity, from the humid Niger Delta to the arid Sahel region.

title: Nigerian Savanna Ecosystem Study
description: Biological data from savanna ecosystem studies, including species diversity and environmental factors in Northern Nigeria.
tutorial: Analyze species diversity and create food web diagrams. Discuss conservation challenges in Nigerian savannas.
nigerian_context: Data from Northern Nigeria's savanna ecosystems, highlighting biodiversity in regions affected by desertification.

title: World Bank Nigeria Development Indicators
description: Selected World Bank indicators for Nigeria, focusing on education, health, and infrastructure development.
tutorial: Track Nigeria's progress on Sustainable Development Goals. Create trend graphs for education and health indicators.
nigerian_context: World Bank data showing Nigeria's development trajectory, useful for comparing with other African nations.
